display.title: Europium
description: &&aEuropium&&r is the first major Fusion Material. You'll be using this quite a lot going forwards.
&&eNote&&r: The temperature of liquid Europium is very hot, but the fluid isn't a plasma. Plan your piping accordingly!
&&l&&3Lore:&&r&&o In Gregicality Legacy, Europium was replaced with Rutherfordium as the first fusion material, because Europium is actually found in Rare Earth and isn't fused in real life.
